title: Reciting Surah Mulk before going to bed - Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: from Pakistan she says that is reciting surat al-mulk and surat s in Judah after Asia part of the Sunna the answer is no the Sun is to recite surat al-mulk and surat sh de before going to bed some say that okay this includes from after Asia until I fall asleep but the best thing to do is to pray it as you are preparing to go to bed as you are attempting to fall asleep this is the right thing to do and this is the best way of doing it her second
